title: PBE And The 8000RP and 5 Blue Essence
body:
I dont know but i didnt see any message why we dont have 999k RP and 99k BE Can anyone explain why because at the problem messages they dont say anything about the money at pbe. i want to test some things but 8krp and 5 BE ist not enough for my or are there any buggs ? that is didnt know. i hope someone can tell me whats going on ty ^^
> {{champion:245}}

replies.body: Our PBE team has posted an [FAQ](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/6KrtEEwg-1018-pbe-status-faq), but you will be getting a stipend daily now around noon pacific time.
